about: Hello there! I'm Michaël, I've worked in the video game industry for the past 4 years as a gameplay programmer.
I trained in backend development to acquire new skills, and I'm always eager to learn new things!

projects.SoftDesk: SoftDesk is a secure RESTful API designed for issue tracking. The application allows users to create and manage multiple projects, invite collaborators to specific projects, and track issues within those projects. Users can assign labels to issues based on their priority and leave comments to facilitate communication and collaboration. SoftDesk provides an organized and efficient way to monitor and resolve project-related problems.
projects.LITRevu: LitRevu is a platform designed for sharing and discovering written content reviews. Users can post requests for critiques on books, articles, or any other type of content, as well as directly publish their own reviews. The platform also encourages interaction by allowing users to respond to others’ requests. A subscription system is available to follow your favorite reviewers and stay updated on their latest insights.
projects.AlgoInvest: An algorithm with a brute force version and an optimized version, designed to calculate the best return on investment for stock purchases, with a maximum budget and criteria such as: a stock can only be purchased once, and fractional shares cannot be bought.
projects.StocksApplication: This is a project built with ASP.NET Core (.NET 8). It fetches and displays real-time stock prices using the Finnhub API. The project is continuously updated as I progress through my ASP.NET Core journey.
projects.Harmony: Harmony is a 2D story-driven game. I worked on the project as both a Gameplay Programmer and UI Programmer, focusing on implementing core mechanics and designing intuitive user interfaces that support the narrative experience.
projects.Jusant: Jusant is a 3D climbing game that emphasizes exploration and environmental storytelling. I contributed to the project as a UI Programmer, developing the menu and HUD systems such as icons appearing above the interactable objects.
projects.OrdersManagerAPI: This project is an API built with .NET Core, designed to manage orders and their associated items. It provides CRUD operations to create, read, update, and delete orders and order items. The API uses Entity Framework for data access and MySQL as the database.
projects.BudgetManager: Budget Manager is a Django-based web application designed to help users manage their personal finances with ease. It allows users to securely create an account, track income and expenses, organize transactions by category, and export their financial data.
projects.EpicEvent: Epic Event is a Python-based command-line application designed to manage clients, contracts, and events for an event management company.
projects.OrangeLettings: Orange County Lettings is a fictional startup in the US real estate rental sector. This school project focuses on enhancing an existing website by reducing technical debt, redesigning the modular architecture into multiple apps, implementing a CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions, deploying through Render, and setting up error handling and log monitoring using Sentry.
projects.JuniorOnly: A job platform designed specifically for entry-level candidates and career changers looking for their first permanent (CDI) or fixed-term (CDD) positions. It helps users filter out misleading 'junior' offers and makes the job search easier and more relevant, with search options by sector, location, and contract type.
